name: Gravity Partners
description:
Gravity Partners is not a traditional “advertising” agency, we’re a marketing planning agency. It’s our belief that if you don’t have the right strategy, nothing else matters. We focus on driving sales results and efficiencies across connected marketing ecosystems. Our strength is in collaborating with clients to create brand platforms, content and data driven communications that work across the customer journey. How do we do this?
We Operationalize Brands. 
In today’s world, Brands need to be experienced based. They need to be omnipresent. They need to be human. And so does your marketing and communications.
We are creating the next generation agency, and have one of the smartest, most multi-disciplinary teams in the business, with innovative thinkers with broad and deep experience in digital, social and brand – from insights, strategy and marketing to advertising, product development and design.
Founded in 2011 by Jordan Herald and Leigh Himel, Gravity Partners has become one of the fastest growing marketing agencies with clients such as Sobeys Inc., Coca-Cola, Simply Orange, NESTEA, Synaptive Medical, GSK, League, The Glenlivet, Absolut Vodka, Campbell Canada, TELUS, TELUS Consumer Health, Corby Spirit & Wine Ltd.
